aboutComCheck: The application is being developed to simplify the process of public validation of translated materials in electronic format. Users can provide comments and suggestions for changes, which are then collected.
confirmDeleteBook: Are you sure you want to delete the book? All checks, notes, materials, and reviewers will be deleted along with the book. Enter the name of the book to confirm.
confirmDeleteCheck: Are you sure you want to delete the check? All notes, materials, and reviewers will be deleted along with the check.
confirmDeleteInspector: The inspector has notes. Do you want to delete them too or keep them?
confirmDeleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete the project? Along with the project, all books, all checks, notes, materials and verifiers will be deleted. Enter the name of the project to confirm.
contentNotLoaded: The material for verification has not been uploaded
dateFinishCheck: Date of completion of the check
dateStartCheck: Date of start of the check
errorCreateBook: Error creating the book: there is already a book with that name
errorCreateProject: Error creating the project: there is already a project with that name
errorEditNameBook: Error editing the book: there is already a book with that name
errorEditNameProject: Error editing the project: there is already a project with that name
invalidInformationNote: Invalid information for sending a note.
loginToAccess: Please login to access full functionality.
messageAboutNewCheck: Your check was created with a default name. Refresh the page
name: Name
provideLink: Provide a link to the material:
saveToShowLink: To display the link, click the 'Save' button
tokenErrorCreated: Failed to generate or store tokens
tokenWarning: After the page is updated, the token will be unavailable. Please copy the token
warningDeleteProject: Be careful. When deleting the project, all books, checks, notes, materials and inspectors associated with the project will be deleted.
